channel.title: Pizza on Loving my tummy
channel.description: Recent content in Pizza on Loving my tummy

item.title: Broccoli pizza crust
item.description: Preheat the oven: Set the oven to 220째C (425째F). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease it with oil. Prepare the broccoli: Steam the chopped broccoli (including stems if using) until tender. Pulse it in a food processor until finely grated. Transfer the grated broccoli to a cheesecloth or clean kitchen towel and squeeze out as much water as possible to ensure a dry mixture. Make the dough: In a bowl, mix the grated broccoli, egg, 2 tbsp mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.

item.title: Super Mexican pizza
item.description: Preheat the oven: Preheat to 220째C (430째F) or follow the pizza dough package instructions. Place a pizza stone or baking sheet in the oven to heat up. Prepare the base: Roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness and place it on a sheet of parchment paper for easy handling. Spread an even layer of tomato sauce over the dough. Add toppings: Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly over the base.
